titleStmt.title: A true relation from Hull of the present state and condition it is in. As it was written in a letter from thence by one of good quality, to a citizen in London, being dated the 19th of this instant moneth of Septemb. 1643. VVhich letter was brought into London the twenty eight of this moneth.
titleStmt.author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dexter, for Iohn Bull,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas May. cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
